name: NTR'd By Clumsiness
description:
StoryA month after the death of his friend and boss, Chris decides to invite his late friend's son—Jeff—to stay at his house for two weeks while he's in transition to go to college. On the eve of Jeff moving in, Chris decides to mention to his wife the danger that she's about to face; the boy is unusually clumsy.
NTR'd By Clumsiness is a humorous kinetic NTR visual novel that isn't meant to be taken seriously.Features Multiple Perspectives
Bad humor
Sex and stuff...
